title: 26. The Health of Nations
description: For decades, GDP has been the yardstick for measuring living standards around the world. Martha Nussbaum would rather use something that actually works.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: For decades, GDP has been the yardstick for measuring living standards around the world. Martha Nussbaum would rather use something that actually works.
